koohiiStory1: During a traffic jam it is impossible to get your car to enter the roadway as it is crowded with cars. Think of a grid lock so bad cars are litterally scraping up against each other like people on a Japanese train during rush hour.
koohiiStory2: Everybody tries to enter the road during rush hour. That´s why it´s so crowded.

myStory: tụ tập. đông đúc. đến đi vòng
readingExamples: 込む (こ.む), 込める (こ.める)
